page.title: 02RUTHVEN BARRACKS - 1
page.content:
{Ruthven Barracks}puts{Kingussie}on the map! When the new A9 trunk road was built and Kingussie by-passed for the first time in a long history of trade with travellers on the trunk road. Local folks feared they would be overlooked.
The community council, however, supplied the manpower and with the help of grants{Ruthven Barracks}were floodlit. They are now a magnificent spectacle for the night traveller, particularly from the new A9 and their setting against green hills is very impressive during the day. Holiday brochures for the area feature this view in a whole page advertisement.
